data.name: RPG Maker MV - The Agency
data.detailed_description:
Big or small, every mystery needs a detective to solve it. And every detective needs a proper music theme.

Composed by Murray Atkinson from VGM Library, The Agency was inspired by a variety of detective and crime fiction - from classic Sherlock Holmes to the modern police procedural, there's a theme for every setting. CSI inspired modern themes featuring dark, dramatic, pulsing synths and percussion, ambient avante garde noire inspired swells and clusters, chilled Pink Panther style jazz, and modern pop inspired themes featuring piano and conjuring images of 007 Skyfall, The Mentalist, Mission Impossible, spy flicks and more. 27 songs ranging in a large variety of styles, this unique asset pack provides a perfect backdrop for solving mysteries.

This pack contains:

  • 27 masterfully-composed songs.
  • Themes range from Victorian Sherlock-inspired pieces to modern and vintage crime scene investigative jazz.
  • Includes several spy themes, perfect for accompanying incredible heists!
  • .m4a, .ogg, and .mp3 formats included.
  • Royalty free music to use in your commercial and non-commercial RPG Maker MV projects.

Track list:

- Brood and Foreboding
- Clockwork Detective
- Closed Case
- Composing Helps Me Think
- Crime Scene Investigation
- Daggers and Cloakers
- En Route to the Scene
- Falling Skies
- Get Sherlock
- In the Conservatory with the Revolver
- Jazz Club Combo
- Metropolitan Mystery
- Mission - Abandoned Factory
- Mission Unstoppable
- Race Against Time
- Spectral Visions
- Stranger in Chinatown
- The Awakening
- The Candlestick in the Library
- The Forgotten Cello
- The Heist
- The Investigation
- The Pink Pincher
- The Silence is Killing Me
- Theme for Stella
- Theremin Thriller
- Ye Old Nut Cracker

Check out our other Music Packs created by Murray Atkinson:

Wonderland Music Pack
Medieval Warfare Music Pack
Heaven and Earth Music Pack
Rebel Rapture Music Pack
Epic Strings Music Pack
Heist Music Pack
Emporium of Copper and Steel Music Pack
Sinister Hollows Music Pack
Classic Fantasy Music Pack

data.short_description: Detective music pack featuring CSI inspired modern themes, chilled Pink Panther style jazz, modern pop themes featuring piano and conjuring images of 007 Skyfall, The Mentalist, Mission Impossible, spy flicks and more
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 or better video resolution
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy RPG Maker MV - The Agency
